body: Currently, when I start Magarena it says it is loading 5906 cards but the card explorer shows 5778. Why and which one is correct?
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Discrepancy between card count in splash and card explorer/deck editor.

comments.body: Posted this on Google Groups by accident - The lower number is the correct card count. The higher number is counting the .groovy files as well as the .txt files.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
Thanks for the explanation - just to confirm it loads all ".txt" (no ".groovy") files from the "scripts" directory but was not excluding token files. I have updated the calculation for the splash message to filter out tokens assuming that a token file has "token" in the filename. Interestingly, it still seems to be out by one or two which might be down to an incorrectly named token file.

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Labels:** -Type- Type-Defect
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: There was one last token yet to be converted to the new naming convention, Germ. I've fixed this in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=391ec29392b813692b19b6407be710f2b36ee71d The two number match now.
